divs: Sighting Detailsi was in my back yard and was bent over getting some stuff out of my trunk and when i stood back up they were just above the horizen directly in front of me.i knew they were ufo's they just hovered in the sky never moving ionly watched for a few seconds then went insidetold my wife but when we came back out they were gone.they looked like upside down pie pans with another smaller dome on top.i was stunned for a second but that was all.after i saw them i would catch myself looking into the sky checking to see if they were back again.this went on for about 2 months i guess.but i have never seen them again.this happened around the time that mars was so visible if this helps pin point the time better.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Sumter
There were no other sightings in Sumter on or around August 18th 2004
Summary: i saw about 5 or 6 in a staggered row across the sky at dusk.
